amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert language prohibiting use of funds to implement or enforce sections 117, 121, or 122 of the bill. Section 117 relates to Sage-Grouse; section 121 relates to reissuance of rules (wolves); and section 122 relates to the Northern Long Eared Bat.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement or enforce sections 117, 121, or 122 of the bill. Section 117 relates to Sage-Grouse; section 121 relates to reissuance of rules (wolves); and section 122 relates to the Northern Long Eared Bat.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 243 (Roll no. 404).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 243 (Roll no. 404).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
